name: Desespirated
description:
Manage you sailors to avoid your boat from sinking: 

-Your team gets assigned a random assortment of stats: manage your specialist in the best way you can to stay afloat as much as possible!

-Resist tornadoes, get destroyed by the kraken and repair the holes all that stuff made.

-Watch the beautiful graphics, cause this time we actually had people in almost every area! 

This game was made for the Ludum Dare game jam by a team of around 20 people. We hope you enjoy it!
